params._actionType: which of the 3 bounty types (above) to run.
params._user: address can be a fixed amt (Base Bounty) or dynamic amt based on rewards removed from target user during execution (ineligible revenue, autocompound fee)

returns._0: bounty in PRNT to be paid to Hunter (via vesting)

params._actionType: which of the 3 bounty types (above) to run.
params._execute: whether to execute this txn, or just quote what its execution would return can be a fixed amt (Base Bounty) or dynamic amt based on rewards removed from target user during execution (ineligible revenue, autocompound fee)

returns.bounty: in PRNT to be paid to Hunter (via vesting)

params._baseBountyUsdTarget: Base Bounty is paid in PRNT, will scale to match this USD target value
params._chef: CIC, to query bounties for ineligible emissions
params._hunterShare: % of reclaimed rewards to send to Hunter
params._mfd: MFD, to send bounties as vesting PRNT to Hunter (user calling bounty)
params._priceProvider: PriceProvider service, to get PRNT price for bounty quotes

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

returns.actionType: which of the 3 bounty types (above) to run. _getAvailableBounty returns this based on priority (expired locks first, then inelig emissions, then autocompound)
returns.bounty: amount of PRNT Hunter will recieve. can be a fixed amt (Base Bounty) or dynamic amt based on rewards removed from target user during execution (ineligible revenue, autocompound fee)

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

setBaseBountyUsdTarget(uint256).details: Only owner can call this function.

setBounties().details: Only owner can call this function.

setHunterShare(uint256).details: Only owner can call this function.

setMaxBaseBounty(uint256).details: Only owner can call this function.

setMinStakeAmount(uint256).details: Only owner can call this function.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

Recovered(address,uint256).notice: Emitted when ERC20 token is recovered

executeBounty(address,bool,uint256).notice: Execute the most appropriate bounty on a user, check returned amount for slippage, calc amount going to Hunter, send to vesting.

getBaseBounty().notice: Return PRNT amount for Base Bounty. Base Bounty used to incentivize operations that don't generate their own reward to pay to Hunter.

quote(address).notice: Given a user, return their bounty amount. uses staticcall to run same bounty aglo, but without execution

recoverERC20(address,uint256).notice: Recover ERC20 tokens from the contract.

setBaseBountyUsdTarget(uint256).notice: Sets target price of base bounty.
